channel.title: How Do you make it so people log in and they're a member (premium)
channel.description:
Im using Devolution source..and now it makes them log in as non-premium, What file do I change that in?
Thanks
~Michaela

item.title: How Do you make it so people log in and they're a member (premium)
item.dc:creator: @itzkyle Lusfr
item.description:
@itzkyle wrote:

Bakatool retired from p servers (Not RSC p server)

And just make it so the switch for playerRights make the person member

Read full topic
item.source: How Do you make it so people log in and they're a member (premium)

item.title: How Do you make it so people log in and they're a member (premium)
item.dc:creator: @xdragon140 xdragon140
item.description:
@xdragon140 wrote:

Ok first off open player.java and search for

	Calendar cal = new GregorianCalendar();

under it should be

	int day = cal.get(Calendar.DAY_OF_MONTH);
	int month = cal.get(Calendar.MONTH);
	int year = cal.get(Calendar.YEAR);
	int calc = ((year * 10000) + (month * 100) + day);
	playerLastLogin = calc;
	playerLastConnect = "";
	playerIsMember = 1;
	playerMessages = 0;

just make

	playerIsMember = 1;

in your the 1 will probably be a 0 change it to a 1

Read full topic
item.source: How Do you make it so people log in and they're a member (premium)
